tool_description: Performs Address Verification System (AVS) checks by comparing provided billing address with card issuer records.
error_messages: Missing required address fields: All address fields (street, postal code, city, state, country) must be provided.
Invalid country code: Country must be a valid ISO 2-letter country code (e.g., US, CA, GB).
Invalid verification level: Use one of [basic, standard, strict].
Address format error: Address components contain invalid characters or formatting.
AVS service unavailable: Address verification service is temporarily unavailable - retry later.
usage: Provide complete billing address details and card_number. Set verification_level based on desired strictness. Returns AVS response codes and match results.

avs_code.description: AVS response code from the verification
